Kashira:
Decchi (丁稚)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (Somemoyō imose no kadomatsu / 染模様妹背門松)

A Tragic Love Triangle (Hadesugata onna maiginu / 艶容女舞衣)

The Love Suicides at Sonezaki (Sonezaki shinjū / 曽根崎心中)

Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (Sugawara denju tenarai kagami / 菅原伝授手習鑑)

The Red-Hot Love of the Greengrocer's Daughter (Datemusume koi no higanoko / 伊達娘恋緋鹿子)

The Love of Ohan and Choemon (Katsuragawa renri no shigarami / 桂川連理柵)

The Love-Inspired Murder (Koimusume mukashi hachijō / 恋娘昔八丈)

The League of the 47 Ronin (Kanadehon Chūshingura / 仮名手本忠臣蔵)

The Love Suicides at Amijima (Shinjū ten no Amijima / 心中天網島)

The Adachi Plain in Oshu (Ōshu Adachigahara / 奥州安達原)

The Love Suicide of Tokubei and Ofusa (Shinjū kasaneizutsu / 心中重井筒)

The Faithful Wife (Kamiko-jitate ryōmenkagami / 紙子仕立両面鑑)

The Romance in the Gay Quarters (Kuruwa bunshō / 曲輪ぶんしょう)

The Three Generations of Kamakura Shoguns (Kamakura sandaiki / 鎌倉三代記)

The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo (Shinjū Yoigōshin / 心中宵庚申)

The Two Butterflies (Futatsu chōchō kuruwa nikki / 双蝶々曲輪日記)

The Story of the Morning Glory (Shōutsushi asagao banashi / 生写朝顔話)

The Love Suicide at Amijima (Ten no Amijima shigure no kotatsu / 天網島時雨炬燵)

The Ancient Calendar (Daikyōji mukashigoyomi / 大経師昔暦)

The Double Suicide at Ikudama (Ikudama shinjū / 生玉心中)

The Tragedy of Love in Error (Zōhō koibakke / 増補恋八卦)

The Eternal Love of Onatsu and Seijurō (Kotobuki renri no matsu / 寿連理の松)

The Greengrocer's Tragedy (Yaoya no kondate / 八百屋献立)

The Teachings for Women (Imoseyama onna teikin / 妹背山婦女庭訓)
